text: Anthony Di Pietro (born 15 February 1969) is an Australian businessman who works in Melbourne. He is the former chairman of the Victorian football club Melbourne Victory. He is also the Chief Executive Officer of a national fruit and vegetable produce company, called 'Premier Fresh Australia'.https://premierfresh.com.au/premier-board/ ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Melbourne Category:Australian businesspeople
title: Anthony Di Pietro
